Greensboro.Lyndon Street Townhouses: Lyndon Street Townhouses are four historic rowhouses located at Greensboro, Guilford County, North Carolina. They were built about 1905, and is a two-story, three bay, brick structure with Colonial Revival and Queen Anne style design elements. Each house features a polygonal bay window at the second story and they are united by a full-width porch supported by seven Doric order columns raised on tall brick piers.
